attributes.action: Reverse the decision of a nationwide lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: We have been presented with scenarios of what could happen. If something could happen, equally it might not. I do not underestimate the seriousness of coronavirus but I can’t see the justification for the heartbreak and devastation lockdown is causing. SAGE has no virologist or epidemiologist, mathematic modelling is being for this decision. The figure of 4000 deaths a day is questionable, cases are rising at 6% per week, how can it be 4000 daily deaths unless the virus mutates.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to reverse its nationwide lockdown decision, due to the devastating consequences lockdown is causing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
